meta_data.description: 1565 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Apartment / Flat in ACE Divino, Sector 1 Greater Noida West * 14 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 17th floor (out of 21). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Greater noida's most popular society ace divino in sector 1 greater noida west offers 3 bhk apartment. This property is close to metro station, close to school, close to hospital and close to mall. Property has attached 3 bathrooms & 2 balconies with 3 rooms set in 1420 sq.Ft. Carpet area. Flat is constructed on 1565 sq.Ft. You get an additional space of others. 1 covered parking available. Placed on 17th of 21 floor. This is a semi-Furnished flat. Furnishing options provided - 9 light, 5 fan, 3 wardrobe, 1 geyser, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. The flat will be available from mon, 13 oct 2025 for family on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 1 month. We are offering this property on 36,000 monthly. Electricity & water charges are not included in rent & to be paid separately. 36000 is required to be paid as the initial payment. This flat has all latest feature like reserved parking, intercom facility, power back-Up, feng shui / vaastu compliant, security / fire alarm and water storage. Society provides modern lifestyle facilities like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), visitor parking and maintenance staff. There are more things to like about this property such as rain water harvesting, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat is facing towards north-East. The flat has vitrified flooring.
